Title: Simple Shooter: A Beginners Guide To Creating Games In Silverlight
Description: This project will take you through some of the steps to creating games with Silverlight. This simple shooter style game that contains some of the building blocks for games that require abilities such as vectors, collision detection, a game loop, movement, and keyboard input.
